channel.title: Save various patches and recall them from SD card?
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I heard this community is great and so it seems last one I got an answer pretty quick! :slight_smile:
What would be the easiest way to save various patches onto the SD card and recall them (program change could work but any other tip?).
THANKS!!

item.title: Save various patches and recall them from SD card?
item.dc:creator: @Captain_Burek Daniel Büring

item.title: Save various patches and recall them from SD card?
item.dc:creator: @BrianA
item.description:
@BrianA wrote:

Check out this thread and particularly the one linked in my last post there. Should get you going.

Preset Manager help Helpdesk
I've been trying to use the Dr Justice's Preset Manager in my latest preset and I'm having some trouble. Axoloti 1.0.12. Windows 7 64 bit. I've tried the drj preset_manager_demo and is mostly working (except, surprisingly, saving, then loading the same patch alters the settings!) I tried to copy it's layout in my patch. So, in my patch, it's 'sort of working' - top level parameters are getting saved and loaded, except: 1) No matter what I do, I can't get it to load (or save?) parameters in a…

Read full topic
